channel.title: To the mods and admins
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/oi8z0g.png[/img]
No I don't know what fully happened. But I do know that rey raided haven and I guess busted a wall in. So James says he is going to tnt hack our city. someone else will post more on what happened.

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:24, topic:379709”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=475552.msg3479022#msg3479022 date=1295932669]

And incase I haven’t cleared up the controversy yet, I got the TNT I have that does NOT WORK from getting sulfur from a dungeon.

Worked for 5 seconds… that was funny
[/quote]
Technically no, because it didn’t even drop blocks, and I couldn’t walk through it.[/quote]

Yea but for a second we where all like “Oh wow Cole… real nice job”.
Then you said “Aww shit”.
Good thing it regenerated.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497

And incase I haven’t cleared up the controversy yet, I got the TNT I have that does NOT WORK from getting sulfur from a dungeon.
[/quote]
Worked for 5 seconds… that was funny[/quote]

@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I cleaned those posts. Honestly I do not want to see that in ANY topic EVER again. I promise you if I do you’ll receive a not so nice punishment.

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m left with one question after reading this thread.

Why are you guys acting like 9 year olds? Grow up.

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Anymore flame will result in a mute, try to keep it clean for once.

Edit:
Sorry for the lock earlier.

Read full topic

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:379792”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=475552.msg3478147#msg3478147 date=1295854437]

Pretty sure you said ‘you grief, I grief’ right after mentioning TNT?

That was a joke, I don’t see other people getting banned for threatening to TNT hack Haven, do I? So why should my threat be any different?

Oh yeah, because I’m not a kissass - I forgot.
[/quote]It could be the fact that nobody else threatened to TNT hack?[/quote]And the fact that no one else edited an image to make it look incriminating, and also that no one said they saw someone do something when that person was banned at the time.

Read full topic

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Davidi2:

Pretty sure you said ‘you grief, I grief’ right after mentioning TNT?

That was a joke, I don’t see other people getting banned for threatening to TNT hack Haven, do I? So why should my threat be any different?

Oh yeah, because I’m not a kissass - I forgot.

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:15, topic:379709”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=475552.msg3477933#msg3477933 date=1295840480]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=475552.msg3477930#msg3477930 date=1295840293]

Though can someone give me information on ‘I_code_rsps’? It seems like he was doing stuff too.

Part of the Akatsuki posse. You can find out more from Cole and Reyx7
[/quote]Actually he is not part of the Akatsuki group, he lives out back though.

Oh.
Well he did assist in the raid.
Tabby put me in the akutsuki as Itachi you know. Check the thread
[/quote]Yeah I know but I don’t think code every got in officially and the group Akatsuki is a clan of killers o.o So what else would happen?[/quote]
Idk, talk to tabby.
I think I make a pretty badass Itachi.

Read full topic

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:5, topic:379709”]I never even said I would hack, I asked if anyone wanted to hack.[/quote]Pretty sure you said ‘you grief, I grief’ right after mentioning TNT?
You are getting a ban, you also tried to edit it and make it look like cole was saying it.

Though can someone give me information on ‘I_code_rsps’? It seems like he was doing stuff too.

[quote=“Phaze One, post:7, topic:379709”]Uh, did I get mistaken for someone else in this ban[/quote]What? I doubt it, the server is offline at the moment.

Read full topic

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

ranger squad:

I said “who’s up for some TNT hacking”, not “I am going to hack TNT and blow up your city.”

The sentence and the CURRENT SITUATION implies you are targeting them. It was written in context, whether you meant to say it or not.

  • I do not think hacking just to vent your anger would be allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: To the mods and admins
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I would like to point something out…

TNT = sand + sulphur
sulphure = pwnt + creeper
creeper = disabled
